OpenPositionByLyra(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: This event is emitted when a user opens a position using the Lyra protocol, recording important details of the transaction.

params.amount: The amount of the Lyra option.
params.buildID: The unique identifier for the Lyra option position build.
params.iterations: The number of iterations for the Lyra option.
params.maxTotalCost: The maximum total cost allowed for the option.
params.minTotalCost: The minimum total cost allowed for the option.
params.optionType: The type of the Lyra option (e.g., LONG_CALL, LONG_PUT, SHORT_CALL_BASE).
params.positionId: The identifier for the option position.
params.referrer: The referrer associated with the option transaction.
params.setCollateralTo: The collateral amount set for the option.
params.strikeId: The identifier for the strike price of the option.
params.tokenID: The unique identifier of the Lyra option token.

calculateAmount(bytes).details: This public view function calculates the amount of a token based on a set of input parameters. It decodes the parameters, retrieves the necessary information from a Lyra strategy, and calculates the amount based on the option type and related factors.

params.parameters: The encoded parameters for the calculation.

returns.amount: The calculated amount of the token.
returns.token: The address of the token to be calculated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

OpenPositionByLyra(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Emitted when a position is opened using the Lyra protocol.

calculateAmount(bytes).notice: Calculate the amount of a token based on provided parameters.

userdoc.notice: A contract for building and processing Lyra option transactions.
